thread.title: NYGlassgirl

author: NYGlassgirl
title: NYGlassgirl
text: I've been searching for something to hold 13-14" glass rods in groups as I work through designs and color matching in my Flamework Glass Studio at JoyfulAdornments.com. I'm also about to move my entire studio and haven't found boxes to help, that are small enough to keep glass rod colors organized and safe. I found bags the size I needed for small batches that will help with all of this!!! They shipped items out quickly and I received easily. I was referred by other artists I work with and it was a great experience!!
